thread.title: Ifeelgoods Expands Its Rewards Catalog In Asia Pacific
thread.title_full: Ifeelgoods Expands Its Rewards Catalog In Asia Pacific - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Ifeelgoods Expands Its Rewards Catalog In Asia Pacific
text:
Ifeelgoods further enriches its rewards offering in Asia through new partnerships with local rewards providers, in addition to extending relationships with existing global partners in the region.
Palo Alto, CA
Today Ifeelgoods announces that it has expanded its rewards catalog throughout Asia Pacific, including: Malaysia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Korea, India, China, Indonesia, Thailand and the Philippines. Meeting the tremendous demand for B2B rewards in the Asia Pacific region, the Ifeelgoods turnkey platform and extensive catalog allow companies to seamlessly run campaigns and programs with relevant and trendy rewards in the region.
Ifeelgoods successfully extended its relationship with its existing global partners – including highly popular brands such as iTunes and Amazon.com - to unlock B2B distribution in the Asian market.
Additionally, Ifeelgoods enriched its rewards offering through partnerships with popular local rewards, such as the following:
VPreca : Pre-paid visa reward that allow users to spend money online Skylark : Gift card offering users dinners in fancy restaurants Flipkart : Flipkart , an Indian online store, which gathers a whole suite of products including movies, music, games mobiles, cameras, healthcare and personal products Jabong : One of the most popular shopping platforms in India that provides quality branded products such as footwear, apparel, jewelry and accessories
Along with the catalog, Ifeelgoods provides a best in-class technology solution to securely deliver the rewards. Through its on-demand API, brands can easily integrate with Ifeelgoods and offer their customers a unique branded reward flow experience. Users redeem the reward of their choice and can share the offer with their friends on social networks. The brands also benefit from top notch reporting and analytics to: track all activity in real-time, monitor and optimize promotion performance, and perform basic customer support functions.
“We spotted this huge gap in the market regarding B2B digital content availability in the Asia Pacific markets,” says Mike Samachisa, Ifeelgoods’ VP of Business Development. “We’ve been enhancing our platform offering by aggregating relevant local rewards and become a one-stop shop for rewards provisioning across Asia Pacific.”
The Ifeelgoods platform serves multiple industries in Asia, including employee recognition, loyalty, e-commerce, customer support and CPG. Ifeelgoods has already implemented dozens of successful campaigns in Asia for large brands in various sectors.
Through this catalog extension, Ifeelgoods successfully meets the demand from its local customers and regional distributors to expedite both the procurement of rewards and the implementation of campaigns in Asia Pacific.
ABOUT IFEELGOODS
Ifeelgoods’ turnkey platform enables companies to set up, launch and monitor rewards promotions and programs within minutes. It helps companies achieve multiple business objectives: customer acquisition, retention, engagement, employee motivation and more. End-users can directly receive rewards from 100+ integrated apps including Mailchimp, Salesforce, SurveyMonkey, Paypal and Zendesk. Gifts delivered come from Ifeelgoods’ 100,000+ rewards catalog with content that ranges from movies, songs, games, apps, newspaper subscriptions, and gift cards.
The Ifeelgoods platform has delivered 30+ million rewards across industries worldwide and has powered campaigns for 300 leading brands such as Walmart, GAP and L’Oréal.
Learn more: http://www.ifeelgoods.com/
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13014880.htm
